    "ERR_RSA_CGO_RATE_LIMIT",       // rsa cgo operations exceed rate limit 
    "ERR_RSA_REMOTE_KEY_NOT_EXIST", // remote server not found rsa key
}

type ModuleCrypto struct {
    name   string               // name of module
    state  *module_state2.State // module state

    delayRsaDec *delay_counter.DelayRecent // delay for RsaDecrypt
    delayEccMul *delay_counter.DelayRecent // delay for EccScalarMult
    delayEccGenkey *delay_counter.DelayRecent // delay for EccGenerateKey
    
    conf   *ConfModCrypto       // crypto config
    client *RemoteClient        // crypto client 

    limitRsaCgo *bfe_util.RateLimiter // rate limiter for Cgo RSA operations
}

func NewModuleCrypto() *ModuleCrypto {
    m := new(ModuleCrypto)
    m.name = "mod_crypto"
    m.state = new(module_state2.State)
    
    m.state.Init()
    m.state.CountersInit(COUNTER_KEYS)
    m.state.SetNoahKeyPrefix(bfe_basic.NOAH_SD_MOD_CRYPTO)
    
    m.delayRsaDec = new(delay_counter.DelayRecent)
    m.delayRsaDec.Init(DC_INTERVAL, DC_BUCKET_SIZE, DC_BUCKET_NUM)
    m.delayRsaDec.SetNoahKeyPrefix(bfe_basic.NOAH_SD_MOD_CRYPTO_RSA_DEC_DELAY)

    m.delayEccMul = new(delay_counter.DelayRecent)
    m.delayEccMul.Init(DC_INTERVAL, DC_BUCKET_SIZE, DC_BUCKET_NUM)
    m.delayEccMul.SetNoahKeyPrefix(bfe_basic.NOAH_SD_MOD_CRYPTO_ECC_MUL_DELAY)

    m.delayEccGenkey = new(delay_counter.DelayRecent)
    m.delayEccGenkey.Init(DC_INTERVAL, DC_BUCKET_SIZE, DC_BUCKET_NUM)
    m.delayEccGenkey.SetNoahKeyPrefix(bfe_basic.NOAH_SD_MOD_CRYPTO_ECC_GKY_DELAY)

    return m
}

func (m *ModuleCrypto) Name() string {
    return m.name
}

// initial crypto lib and crypto client
func (m *ModuleCrypto) initCrypto() {
    // register thirdparty implementation for RSA
    rsa.SetRsaAgent(m)

    // register thirdparty implementation for ECC
    elliptic.SetEccAgent(m)
    
    // initial crypto client
    if m.shouldUseClient() {
        m.client = NewRemoteClient(m.conf, m.state)
    }
}

func (m *ModuleCrypto) shouldUseClient() bool {
    if m.conf.Basic.RSA == CRYPTO_REMOTE || m.conf.Basic.RSA == CRYPTO_HYBRID {
        return true
    }
    return false
}

// initial rate limiter 
func (m *ModuleCrypto) initRateLimiter() {
    if m.conf.Basic.RSA == CRYPTO_HYBRID {
        cgoRate := int64(m.conf.Hybrid.RsaCgoRate)
        cgoBurst := int64(m.conf.Hybrid.RsaCgoBurst)
        m.limitRsaCgo = bfe_util.NewRateLimiter(cgoRate, cgoBurst)
    }
}

func (mod *ModuleCrypto) RsaDecrypt(priv *rsa.PrivateKey, c *big.Int) (m *big.Int, err error) {
    mod.state.Inc("RSA_DECRYPT", 1)
    start := time.Now()

    method := mod.conf.Basic.RSA
    switch method {
    case CRYPTO_REMOTE:
        mod.state.Inc("RSA_DECRYPT_REMOTE", 1)
        m, err = mod.client.RsaDecrypt(priv, c)

    case CRYPTO_CGO:
        mod.state.Inc("RSA_DECRYPT_CGO", 1)
        m, err = RsaDecryptCgo(priv, c)

    case CRYPTO_NATIVE:
        mod.state.Inc("RSA_DECRYPT_NATIVE", 1)
        m, err = rsa.Decrypt(nil, priv, c)

    case CRYPTO_HYBRID:
        mod.state.Inc("RSA_DECRYPT_HYBRID", 1)

        // try 'REMOTE' first
        mod.state.Inc("RSA_DECRYPT_HYBRID_REMOTE", 1)
        m, err = mod.client.RsaDecrypt(priv, c)
        if err == nil {
             break
        }

        // if failed, fallback to 'CGO'
        // Note: Since RsaDecryptCgo() is not effective enough and may excessively 
        // consume cpu resource,  we had better limit the rate of calling RsaDecryptCgo()
        if !mod.limitRsaCgo.Try() {
            mod.state.Inc("ERR_RSA_CGO_RATE_LIMIT", 1)
            err = fmt.Errorf("exceed rate limit for RsaDecryptCgo (remote:%s)", err.Error())
            break
        }
        mod.state.Inc("RSA_DECRYPT_HYBRID_CGO", 1)
        m, err = RsaDecryptCgo(priv, c)

    /* never go here */
    default:
        m, err = mod.client.RsaDecrypt(priv, c)
    }

    mod.delayRsaDec.AddBySub(start, time.Now())
    if err != nil {
        mod.state.Inc("RSA_DECRYPT_FAIL", 1)
    }

    if openDebug {
        log.Logger.Debug("%s RsaDecrypt(%s) finish(%v), elapse %d us", mod.name, method, err,
                         time.Since(start).Nanoseconds() / 1000)
    }
    return
}

func (mod *ModuleCrypto) EccScalarMult(bigX, bigY *big.Int, scalar []byte, curveId uint16) (
                                       x1 *big.Int, y1 *big.Int, err error) {
    mod.state.Inc("ECC_SCALAR_MULT", 1)
    start := time.Now()

    method := mod.conf.Basic.ECC
    switch method {
    case CRYPTO_CGO:
        mod.state.Inc("ECC_SCALAR_MULT_CGO", 1)
        if curveId == uint16(bfe_tls.CurveP256) {
            x1, y1, err = EccScalarMultP256(bigX, bigY, scalar)
        } else {
            // never go here 
            x1, y1, err = nil, nil, fmt.Errorf("unsupported curve[%d] for CGO ScalarMult", curveId)
        }

    case CRYPTO_NATIVE:
        mod.state.Inc("ECC_SCALAR_MULT_NATIVE", 1)
        fallthrough

    default:
        mod.state.Inc("ECC_SCALAR_MULT_DEFAULT", 1)
        // Note: will fallback to native implementation
        x1, y1, err = nil, nil, fmt.Errorf("fallback to native implementation")  
    }

    mod.delayEccMul.AddBySub(start, time.Now())
    if openDebug {
        log.Logger.Debug("%s EccScalarMultP256(%s) finish(%v), elapse %d us", mod.name, method, err,
                         time.Since(start).Nanoseconds() / 1000)
    }
    return
}

func (mod *ModuleCrypto) EccGenerateKey(curveId uint16) (key []byte, x *big.Int, y *big.Int, err error) {
    mod.state.Inc("ECC_GEN_KEY", 1)
    start := time.Now()
    
    method := mod.conf.Basic.ECC
    switch method {
    case CRYPTO_CGO:
        mod.state.Inc("ECC_GEN_KEY_CGO", 1)
        if curveId == uint16(bfe_tls.CurveP256) {
            key, x, y, err = EccGenkeyP256()
        } else {
            key, x, y, err = nil, nil, nil, fmt.Errorf("unsupported curve[%d] for CGO generate key", curveId)
        }

    case CRYPTO_NATIVE:
        mod.state.Inc("ECC_GEN_KEY_NATIVE", 1)
        curve, _ := bfe_tls.CurveForCurveID(bfe_tls.CurveID(curveId))
        if curve == nil {
            key, x, y, err = nil, nil, nil, fmt.Errorf("unknown curveId[%d]", curveId)
        } else {
            key, x, y, err = elliptic.GenerateKeyNative(curve, rand.Reader)
        }

    default:
        /* never go here */
        mod.state.Inc("ECC_GEN_KEY_DEFAULT", 1)
        curve, _ := bfe_tls.CurveForCurveID(bfe_tls.CurveID(curveId))
        if curve == nil {
            key, x, y, err = nil, nil, nil, fmt.Errorf("unknown curveId[%d]", curveId)
        } else {
            key, x, y, err = elliptic.GenerateKeyNative(curve, rand.Reader)
        }
    }

    mod.delayEccGenkey.AddBySub(start, time.Now())

    if err != nil {
        mod.state.Inc("ECC_GEN_KEY_FAIL", 1)      
    }

    if openDebug {
        log.Logger.Debug("%s EccGenerateKeyP256(%s) finish(%v), elapse %d us", mod.name, method, err,
                         time.Since(start).Nanoseconds() / 1000)
    }
    return
}

func (m *ModuleCrypto) Attr() map[string]interface{} {
    // reload items
    reloadEntries := []string {
    }

    // monitor items (item name, item type)
    monitorEntries := map[string]string {
        m.name: bfe_basic.MON_TYPE_STATE,
        m.name + ".delay_rsa_dec": bfe_basic.MON_TYPE_DELAY_RECENT,
        m.name + ".delay_ecc_mul": bfe_basic.MON_TYPE_DELAY_RECENT,
        m.name + ".delay_ecc_genkey": bfe_basic.MON_TYPE_DELAY_RECENT,
    }

    return map[string]interface{} {
        bfe_basic.MON_ATTR_RELOAD : reloadEntries,
        bfe_basic.MON_ATTR_MONITOR: monitorEntries,
    }
}

func (m *ModuleCrypto) getState() *module_state2.StateData {
    return m.state.GetAll()
}

func (m *ModuleCrypto) getDelayRsaDec() *delay_counter.DelayOutput {
    delayOuput := m.delayRsaDec.Get()
    return &delayOuput
}

func (m *ModuleCrypto) getDelayEccMul() *delay_counter.DelayOutput {
    delayOuput := m.delayEccMul.Get()
    return &delayOuput
}

func (m *ModuleCrypto) getDelayEccGenKey() *delay_counter.DelayOutput {
    delayOuput := m.delayEccGenkey.Get()
    return &delayOuput
}

// all monitor handlers
func (m *ModuleCrypto) monitorHandlers() map[string]interface{} {
    handlers := map[string]interface{} {
        m.name: web_monitor.CreateStateDataHandler(m.getState),
        m.name + ".delay_rsa_dec": web_monitor.CreateDelayOutputHandler(m.getDelayRsaDec),
        m.name + ".delay_ecc_mul": web_monitor.CreateDelayOutputHandler(m.getDelayEccMul),
        m.name + ".delay_ecc_genkey": web_monitor.CreateDelayOutputHandler(m.getDelayEccGenKey),
    }
    return handlers
}

// all reload handlers
func (m *ModuleCrypto) reloadHandlers() map[string]interface{} {
    handlers := map[string]interface{} {
    }
    return handlers
}

func (m *ModuleCrypto) Init(cbs *bfe_module.BfeCallbacks, whs *web_monitor.WebHandlers,
                           cr string) error {
    var conf *ConfModCrypto
    var err error

    // load module config
    confPath := bfe_module.ModConfPath(cr, m.name)
    if conf, err = ConfLoad(confPath, cr); err != nil {
        return fmt.Errorf("%s: conf load err %s", m.name, err.Error())
    }
    openDebug = conf.Log.OpenDebug
    m.conf = conf

    // register thirdparty crypto implementation
    m.initCrypto()

    m.initRateLimiter()

    // register web handler for monitor
    err = web_monitor.RegisterHandlers(whs, web_monitor.WEB_HANDLE_MONITOR, m.monitorHandlers())
    if err != nil {
        return fmt.Errorf("%s.Init():RegisterHandlers(m.monitorHandlers): %s", m.name, err.Error())
    }
    // register web handler for reload
    err = web_monitor.RegisterHandlers(whs, web_monitor.WEB_HANDLE_RELOAD, m.reloadHandlers())
    if err != nil {
        return fmt.Errorf("%s.Init():RegisterHandlers(m.reloadHandlers): %s", m.name, err.Error())
    }

    return nil
}

/* conf_mod_decrypt_uri.go - config for mod_decrypt_uri */
/*
modification history
--------------------
2014/7/23, by Weiwei, create
*/
/*
DESCRIPTION
*/
package mod_decrypt_uri

import (
        "errors"
)

import (
    "code.google.com/p/gcfg"
        "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/conf_path"
        "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/log"
)

var ErrPathNotSet = errors.New("decrypt conf path not set")

type ConfModDecryptUri struct {
        Basic struct {
                Path string
        }

    Log struct {
        OpenDebug bool
    }
}

/* load config from config file    */
func ConfLoad(filePath string, confRoot string) (*ConfModDecryptUri, error) {
    var err error
    var cfg ConfModDecryptUri

    // read config from file
    err = gcfg.ReadFileInto(&cfg, filePath)
    if err != nil {
        return &cfg, err
    }

    // check conf of mod_access
    err = cfg.Check(confRoot)
    if err != nil {
        return &cfg, err
    }

    return &cfg, nil
}

func (cfg *ConfModDecryptUri) Check(confRoot string) error {
        if cfg.Basic.Path == "" {
                log.Logger.Error("ModDecrypt Path not set")
                return ErrPathNotSet
        }

        cfg.Basic.Path = conf_path.ConfPathProc(cfg.Basic.Path, confRoot)
        return nil
}

/* decrypt_uri_conf_load.go - load decrypt uri  */
/*
modification history
--------------------
2014/7/8, by Zhang Miao, create
*/
/*
DESCRIPTION
*/
package mod_decrypt_uri

import (
    "fmt"
    "sync"
)

import (
    "bfe_util"
)

type DecryptConfTable struct {
        mutex        sync.Mutex
        decryptConf map[string]*DecryptConf
}

type DecryptConfFile struct {
        DecryptUri   *bool
        DecryptRefer *bool

        Key1 *string
        Key2 *string

        BakKey1 *string
        BakKey2 *string
}

func (rawDecryptConf *DecryptConfFile) Check() error {
        // here just check if all field is not nil
        return bfe_util.CheckNilField(*rawDecryptConf, false)
}

// generate from bfe_conf.ConfModDecryptUri
type DecryptConf struct {
        DecryptUri   bool
        DecryptRefer bool

        // decryption needs two key, key1 key2
        Key1 []byte
        Key2 []byte

        // if decrypt using key1|key2 failed, try use bakkey1|bakkey2 to decrypt
        BakKey1 []byte
        BakKey2 []byte
}

// str to []byte whose underlying array terminate with '\0'
// return []byte don't contain terminating '\0'
// typically used with cgo
func strToByteZeroTerm(str string) []byte {
    bZeroTerm := make([]byte, 0, len(str)+1)
    bZeroTerm = append(bZeroTerm, str...)
    return bZeroTerm
}

func NewDecryptConf(conf *DecryptConfFile) *DecryptConf {
        decryptConf := &DecryptConf{
                DecryptUri:   *conf.DecryptUri,
                DecryptRefer: *conf.DecryptRefer,
                Key1:         strToByteZeroTerm(*conf.Key1),
                Key2:         strToByteZeroTerm(*conf.Key2),
        }

        if conf.BakKey1 != nil && conf.BakKey2 != nil {
                decryptConf.BakKey1 = strToByteZeroTerm(*conf.BakKey1)
                decryptConf.BakKey2 = strToByteZeroTerm(*conf.BakKey2)
        }

        return decryptConf
}

func checkDecryptConfFile(conf map[string] *DecryptConfFile) error {
        // cluster decrypt conf check 
        for cluster, cluster_conf := range conf {
                if err := cluster_conf.Check(); err != nil {
                        return fmt.Errorf("cluster %s decrypt conf error %s", cluster, err.Error())
                }
        }
        return nil
}

func (decTable *DecryptConfTable) loadConfig(path string) error {
        var conf map[string]*DecryptConfFile

        if err := bfe_util.LoadJsonFile(path, &conf); err != nil {
                return fmt.Errorf("load decrypt config error, %s", err.Error())
        }

        // check configure
        if err := checkDecryptConfFile(conf); err != nil {
                return err
        }

        newDecryptConf := make(map[string]*DecryptConf)
        for cluster, clusterConf := range conf {
                newDecryptConf[cluster] = NewDecryptConf(clusterConf)
        }

        decTable.mutex.Lock()
        decTable.decryptConf = newDecryptConf
        decTable.mutex.Unlock()

        return nil
}

func (decTable *DecryptConfTable) get(clusterName string) *DecryptConf {
        decTable.mutex.Lock()
        defer decTable.mutex.Unlock()

        return decTable.decryptConf[clusterName]
}


/* ps_se_enc_linux.go - decrypt cbinding for linux  */
/*
modification history
--------------------
2014/7/23, by Weiwei, create
*/
/*
DESCRIPTION:
*/

package enc

/*
#cgo pkg-config: 
#include <enc_for_go.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
*/
import "C"

import (
    "bytes"
    "errors"
    "sync"
    "unsafe"
)

const (
    // decrypt buffer size
    MAX_DECRYPT_LEN = 4096
)

// decrypt pool
var decryptPool sync.Pool

func newDecryptBuf() []byte {
    if v := decryptPool.Get(); v != nil {
        return v.([]byte)
    }

    return make([]byte, MAX_DECRYPT_LEN)
}

func putDecryptBuf(buf []byte) {
    decryptPool.Put(buf)
}

func GetDecryptionUrl(encryptionUrl string, encryKeyStr []byte, ivec []byte,
        flag int) (string, error) {
    // buf to put decrypt url
    decrypt := newDecryptBuf()
    defer putDecryptBuf(decrypt)

    ceu := C.CString(encryptionUrl)

    err := C.Decrypt((*C.char)(unsafe.Pointer(&decrypt[0])),
                 C.int(MAX_DECRYPT_LEN),
                 ceu,
                 (*C.char)(unsafe.Pointer(&encryKeyStr[0])),
                 (*C.uchar)(unsafe.Pointer(&ivec[0])),
                 C.int(flag),
                )

    C.free(unsafe.Pointer(ceu))

    if err != 0 {
        return "", errors.New("decrype failed")
    }

    n := bytes.Index(decrypt, []byte{0})

    return string(decrypt[:n]), nil
}

/* mod_decrypt_uri.go - module for decrypt  */
/*
modification history
--------------------
2014/7/23, by Weiwei, create
*/
/*
DESCRIPTION:
        provide uri and referer decryption when flag(DecryptUri/DecryptRefer) is set.
        Decrypt implementation is c-binding of ps/se/enc module.

        Each cluster (NOT PRODUCT) has a seperate decrypt configuration (need decrypt/decrypt keys).
*/

package mod_decrypt_uri

import (
        "errors"
        "fmt"
        "net/url"
        "strings"
)

import (
        "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/log"
        "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/web_monitor"
)

import (
        "bfe_basic"
        "bfe_http"
        "bfe_module"
        "bfe_modules/mod_decrypt_uri/enc"
)

var ErrNoDecrypt = errors.New("no need decrypt")

type ModuleDecryptUri struct {
        name string // name of module

        conf         *ConfModDecryptUri
        path         string // decrypt configure path
        decryptTable *DecryptConfTable
}

var (
    openDebug = false
)

func decryptDebug(format string, a ...interface{}) {
        if openDebug {
                log.Logger.Debug(format, a...)
        }
}

func NewModuleDecryptUri() *ModuleDecryptUri {
        m := new(ModuleDecryptUri)
        m.name = "mod_decrypt_uri"
        m.decryptTable = new(DecryptConfTable)
        return m
}

func (m *ModuleDecryptUri) Name() string {
        return m.name
}

func (m *ModuleDecryptUri) Attr() map[string]interface{} {
    return map[string]interface{} {
        bfe_basic.MON_ATTR_RELOAD: []string {m.name}, // reload items
    }
}

// loadConfig is a registered reload callback
// params:
//   - query: url query, query["path"] is the file need to load
//          if query["path"] is not set, use default path
func (m *ModuleDecryptUri) loadConfig(query url.Values) error {
    // get file path
    path := query.Get("path")
    if path == "" {
        // default to m.path
        path = m.path
    }

        // load decrypt configure table
        return m.decryptTable.loadConfig(path)
}

func (m *ModuleDecryptUri) Init(cbs *bfe_module.BfeCallbacks, whs *web_monitor.WebHandlers,
        cr string) error {
        var err error
        var conf *ConfModDecryptUri

        confPath := bfe_module.ModConfPath(cr, m.name)
        if conf, err = ConfLoad(confPath, cr); err != nil {
                return fmt.Errorf("%s: conf load err %s", m.name, err.Error())
        }

        return m.init(conf, cbs, whs)
}

func (m *ModuleDecryptUri) init(conf *ConfModDecryptUri, cbs *bfe_module.BfeCallbacks,
        whs *web_monitor.WebHandlers) error {
        m.path = conf.Basic.Path

    // debug switch
    openDebug = conf.Log.OpenDebug

        if err := m.loadConfig(nil); err != nil {
                return fmt.Errorf("err in loadConfig(): %s", err.Error())
        }

        // register handler
        // for after location
        err := cbs.AddFilter(bfe_module.HANDLE_AFTER_LOCATION, m.decryptHandler)
        if err != nil {
            return fmt.Errorf("%s.Init(): AddFilter(m.decryptHandler): %s", m.name, err.Error())
        }

        // register web handler for reload
        err = whs.RegisterHandler(web_monitor.WEB_HANDLE_RELOAD, m.name, m.loadConfig)
        if err != nil {
            return fmt.Errorf("%s.Init(): RegisterHandler(m.loadConfig): %s", m.name, err.Error())
        }

        // save conf pointer
        m.conf = conf

        return nil
}

// if normal key decrypt failed, use bakkey to decrypt
func wwwDecrypt(encryption string, conf *DecryptConf) (string, error) {
        // decrypt use first priority keys
        decryption, err := enc.GetDecryptionUrl(encryption, conf.Key1, conf.Key2, 0)

        // if failed and bakkey is not empty, use bakkey to decrypt
        if err != nil && conf.BakKey1 != nil && conf.BakKey2 != nil &&
                len(conf.BakKey1) != 0 && len(conf.BakKey2) != 0 {
                decryption, err = enc.GetDecryptionUrl(encryption, conf.BakKey1, conf.BakKey2, 0)
        }
    
        return decryption, err
}

func decrypt(u *url.URL, conf *DecryptConf) (string, error) {
        values, err := url.ParseQuery(u.RawQuery)
        if err != nil {
                return "", err
        }

        encrypt := values.Get("url")
        if u.Path != "/link" || encrypt == "" {
                return "", ErrNoDecrypt
        }

        return wwwDecrypt(encrypt, conf)
}

// decrypt refer like link?url=[encrypttext], decrypt encrypttext, the result should also be a url
//  use it as refer
// note: if url contains "www.baidu.com/link?url=", skip decrypt
func decryptRefer(req *bfe_http.Request, conf *DecryptConf) error {
        header := req.Header
        referer := header.Get("Referer")
        if referer == "" {
                return nil
        }

        // don't decrypt the referer www.baidu.com/link?url=xxxx
        if strings.Contains(referer, "www.baidu.com/link?url=") {
                return nil
        }

        // parse refer
        referUrl, err := url.Parse(referer)
        if err != nil {
                return err
        }

        // decrypt refer
        decryptBuf, err := decrypt(referUrl, conf)
        if err != nil {
                return err
        }

        decryptDebug("after decrypt url [%s]", decryptBuf)
        // replace refer
        header.Set("Referer", decryptBuf)
        return nil
}

func decryptUri(req *bfe_http.Request, conf *DecryptConf) error {
        u := req.URL

        decryptBuf, err := decrypt(u, conf)
        if err != nil {
                return err
        }

        // parse decrypted url
        fixUrl, err := url.Parse(decryptBuf)
        if err != nil {
                return err
        }

        // attach previous query params
        u.Path = fixUrl.Path
        values, err := url.ParseQuery(u.RawQuery)
        if err != nil {
                return err
        }

        // remove "url=xxx" part.
        values.Del("url")

        // merge the rest part with decrypt query params
        newValues, err := url.ParseQuery(fixUrl.RawQuery)
        if err != nil {
                return err
        }
        // merge newValues with prev values
        for k, vs := range newValues {
                for _, v := range vs {
                        values.Add(k, v)
                }
        }

        u.RawQuery = values.Encode()
        decryptDebug("after decrypt url [%s]", u.String())

        return nil
}

func (m *ModuleDecryptUri) decrypt(req *bfe_basic.Request, conf *DecryptConf) {
        if conf.DecryptRefer {
                decryptDebug("start decrypt refer %s", req.HttpRequest.URL.String())
                decryptRefer(req.HttpRequest, conf)
        }

        if conf.DecryptUri {
                decryptDebug("start decrypt url %s", req.HttpRequest.URL.String())
                decryptUri(req.HttpRequest, conf)
        }

        return
}

// module call backs
// handler for finish http request
func (m *ModuleDecryptUri) decryptHandler(req *bfe_basic.Request) (int, *bfe_http.Response) {
        conf := m.decryptTable.get(req.Route.Product)

        // no decrypt check
        if conf == nil {
                decryptDebug("no decrypt found %s", req.Route.Product)
                return bfe_module.BFE_HANDLER_GOON, nil
        }

        m.decrypt(req, conf)

        return bfe_module.BFE_HANDLER_GOON, nil
}

/* conf_mod_dict_client.go - config for mod_dict_client */
/*
modification history
--------------------
2014/8/11, by Sijie YANG, create
*/
/*
DESCRIPTION
*/
package mod_dict_client

import (
    "errors"
    "fmt"
    "net"
)

import (
    "code.google.com/p/gcfg"
    "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/conf_path"
)

type ConfModDictClient struct {
    DictClient struct {
        Network        string // service network
        Address        string // service address
        ConnectTimeout int    // connect timeout
        Concurrency    int    // num of connections to dict server
        PendingNum     int    // max num of pending requests
    }
    
    CondRules struct {
        Path           string // path of rules configuration file
    }

    Log struct {
        OpenDebug bool
    }
}

func (conf *ConfModDictClient) Check(cr string) error {
    cfg := conf.DictClient
    rulePath := conf.CondRules
    // check server network and address
    if cfg.Network == "unix" {
        if cfg.Address == "" {
            return fmt.Errorf("address not set")
        }
    } else {
        _, err := net.ResolveTCPAddr(cfg.Network, cfg.Address)
        if err != nil {
            return err
        }
    }

    // check pendingnum
    if cfg.PendingNum > 10000 || cfg.PendingNum <= 0 {
        return errors.New("pending num shoulud be in [0, 10000)")
    }

    // check concurrency
    if cfg.Concurrency <= 0 {
        return errors.New("concurrency not set")
    }

    // check timeout
    if cfg.ConnectTimeout <= 0 {
        return errors.New("connect timeout not set")
    }

    // check rules path
    if rulePath.Path == "" {
        return errors.New("rules file path not set")
    }
    conf.CondRules.Path = conf_path.ConfPathProc(rulePath.Path, cr)

    return nil
}

func ConfLoad(path string, confRoot string) (*ConfModDictClient, error) {
    var err error
    var conf ConfModDictClient

    // read config from file
    if err = gcfg.ReadFileInto(&conf, path); err != nil {
        return &conf, err
    }
    // check conf of mod_dict_client
    err = conf.Check(confRoot)
    if err != nil {
        return &conf, err
    }    

    return &conf, nil
}

// Code generated by protoc-gen-gogo.
// source: bfe_dict_gogo.proto
// DO NOT EDIT!

/*
        Package dict_pb is a generated protocol buffer package.

        It is generated from these files:
                bfe_dict_gogo.proto

        It has these top-level messages:
                DictRequest
                DictResponse
*/
package dict_pb

import proto "code.google.com/p/gogoprotobuf/proto"
import math "math"

import strings "strings"
import reflect "reflect"

import fmt2 "fmt"
import strings1 "strings"
import code_google_com_p_gogoprotobuf_proto1 "code.google.com/p/gogoprotobuf/proto"
import sort "sort"
import strconv "strconv"
import reflect1 "reflect"

import fmt3 "fmt"
import bytes "bytes"

// Reference imports to suppress errors if they are not otherwise used.
var _ = proto.Marshal
var _ = math.Inf

type DictResponse_ResponseCode int32

const (
        DictResponse_OK                DictResponse_ResponseCode = 0
        DictResponse_ERR_BAD_REQ       DictResponse_ResponseCode = 1
        DictResponse_ERR_WRONG_PRODUCT DictResponse_ResponseCode = 2
        DictResponse_ERR_WRONG_PARAMS  DictResponse_ResponseCode = 3
        DictResponse_ERR_INTERNAL      DictResponse_ResponseCode = 4
)

var DictResponse_ResponseCode_name = map[int32]string{
        0: "OK",
        1: "ERR_BAD_REQ",
        2: "ERR_WRONG_PRODUCT",
        3: "ERR_WRONG_PARAMS",
        4: "ERR_INTERNAL",
}
var DictResponse_ResponseCode_value = map[string]int32{
        "OK":                0,
        "ERR_BAD_REQ":       1,
        "ERR_WRONG_PRODUCT": 2,
        "ERR_WRONG_PARAMS":  3,
        "ERR_INTERNAL":      4,
}

func (x DictResponse_ResponseCode) Enum() *DictResponse_ResponseCode {
        p := new(DictResponse_ResponseCode)
        *p = x
        return p
}
func (x DictResponse_ResponseCode) String() string {
        return proto.EnumName(DictResponse_ResponseCode_name, int32(x))
}
func (x *DictResponse_ResponseCode) UnmarshalJSON(data []byte) error {
        value, err := proto.UnmarshalJSONEnum(DictResponse_ResponseCode_value, data, "DictResponse_ResponseCode")
        if err != nil {
                return err
        }
        *x = DictResponse_ResponseCode(value)
        return nil
}

type DictRequest struct {
        Product          *string `protobuf:"bytes,1,req,name=product" json:"product,omitempty"`
        ClientIP         []byte  `protobuf:"bytes,2,opt,name=clientIP" json:"clientIP,omitempty"`
        BaiduID          []byte  `protobuf:"bytes,3,opt,name=baiduID" json:"baiduID,omitempty"`
        Logid            *uint64 `protobuf:"varint,5,opt,name=logid" json:"logid,omitempty"`

        IpCookie         []byte  `protobuf:"bytes,7,opt,name=ipCookie" json:"ipCookie,omitempty"`
        XXX_unrecognized []byte  `json:"-"`
}

        if m != nil && m.Product != nil {
                return *m.Product

        return ""

                return m.Ua

        if m != nil {
                return m.IpCookie
        }
        return nil

type DictResponse struct {
        Code             *DictResponse_ResponseCode `protobuf:"varint,1,req,name=code,enum=dict_pb.DictResponse_ResponseCode,def=0" json:"code,omitempty"`
        Message          *string                    `protobuf:"bytes,2,opt,name=message" json:"message,omitempty"`
        TagsClientIP     []string                   `protobuf:"bytes,3,rep,name=tagsClientIP" json:"tagsClientIP,omitempty"`
        TagsBaiduID      []string                   `protobuf:"bytes,4,rep,name=tagsBaiduID" json:"tagsBaiduID,omitempty"`

        TagsIpCookie     []string                   `protobuf:"bytes,6,rep,name=tagsIpCookie" json:"tagsIpCookie,omitempty"`
        XXX_unrecognized []byte                     `json:"-"`
}

func (m *DictResponse) Reset()      { *m = DictResponse{} }
func (*DictResponse) ProtoMessage() {}

const Default_DictResponse_Code DictResponse_ResponseCode = DictResponse_OK

func (m *DictResponse) GetCode() DictResponse_ResponseCode {
        if m != nil && m.Code != nil {
                return *m.Code

        return Default_DictResponse_Code
}

        if m != nil && m.Message != nil {

func (m *DictRequest) Unmarshal(data []byte) error {
        l := len(data)
        index := 0
        for index < l {
                var wire uint64
                for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                        if index >= l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        b := data[index]
                        index++
                        wire |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                        if b < 0x80 {
                                break
                        }
                }
                fieldNum := int32(wire >> 3)
                wireType := int(wire & 0x7)
                switch fieldNum {
                case 1:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field Product", wireType)
                        }
                        var stringLen uint64
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                stringLen |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + int(stringLen)
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        s := string(data[index:postIndex])
                        m.Product = &s
                        index = postIndex
                case 2:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field ClientIP", wireType)
                        }
                        var byteLen int
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                byteLen |= (int(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + byteLen
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.ClientIP = append(m.ClientIP, data[index:postIndex]...)
                        index = postIndex
                case 3:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field BaiduID", wireType)
                        }
                        var byteLen int
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                byteLen |= (int(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + byteLen
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.BaiduID = append(m.BaiduID, data[index:postIndex]...)
                        index = postIndex
                case 5:
                        if wireType != 0 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field Logid", wireType)
                        }
                        var v uint64
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                v |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        m.Logid = &v
                case 6:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field Ua", wireType)
                        }
                        var byteLen int
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                byteLen |= (int(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + byteLen
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.Ua = append(m.Ua, data[index:postIndex]...)
                        index = postIndex
                case 7:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field IpCookie", wireType)
                        }
                        var byteLen int
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                byteLen |= (int(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + byteLen
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.IpCookie = append(m.IpCookie, data[index:postIndex]...)
                        index = postIndex
                default:
                        var sizeOfWire int
                        for {
                                sizeOfWire++
                                wire >>= 7
                                if wire == 0 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        index -= sizeOfWire
                        skippy, err := code_google_com_p_gogoprotobuf_proto.Skip(data[index:])
                        if err != nil {
                                return err
                        }
                        if (index + skippy) > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.XXX_unrecognized = append(m.XXX_unrecognized, data[index:index+skippy]...)
                        index += skippy
                }
        }
        return nil
}
func (m *DictResponse) Unmarshal(data []byte) error {
        l := len(data)
        index := 0
        for index < l {
                var wire uint64
                for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                        if index >= l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        b := data[index]
                        index++
                        wire |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                        if b < 0x80 {
                                break
                        }
                }
                fieldNum := int32(wire >> 3)
                wireType := int(wire & 0x7)
                switch fieldNum {
                case 1:
                        if wireType != 0 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field Code", wireType)
                        }
                        var v DictResponse_ResponseCode
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                v |= (DictResponse_ResponseCode(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        m.Code = &v
                case 2:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field Message", wireType)
                        }
                        var stringLen uint64
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                stringLen |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + int(stringLen)
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        s := string(data[index:postIndex])
                        m.Message = &s
                        index = postIndex
                case 3:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field TagsClientIP", wireType)
                        }
                        var stringLen uint64
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                stringLen |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + int(stringLen)
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.TagsClientIP = append(m.TagsClientIP, string(data[index:postIndex]))
                        index = postIndex
                case 4:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field TagsBaiduID", wireType)
                        }
                        var stringLen uint64
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                stringLen |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + int(stringLen)
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.TagsBaiduID = append(m.TagsBaiduID, string(data[index:postIndex]))
                        index = postIndex
                case 5:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field TagsUa", wireType)
                        }
                        var stringLen uint64
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                stringLen |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + int(stringLen)
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.TagsUa = append(m.TagsUa, string(data[index:postIndex]))
                        index = postIndex
                case 6:
                        if wireType != 2 {
                                return fmt.Errorf("proto: wrong wireType = %d for field TagsIpCookie", wireType)
                        }
                        var stringLen uint64
                        for shift := uint(0); ; shift += 7 {
                                if index >= l {
                                        return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                                }
                                b := data[index]
                                index++
                                stringLen |= (uint64(b) & 0x7F) << shift
                                if b < 0x80 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        postIndex := index + int(stringLen)
                        if postIndex > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.TagsIpCookie = append(m.TagsIpCookie, string(data[index:postIndex]))
                        index = postIndex
                default:
                        var sizeOfWire int
                        for {
                                sizeOfWire++
                                wire >>= 7
                                if wire == 0 {
                                        break
                                }
                        }
                        index -= sizeOfWire
                        skippy, err := code_google_com_p_gogoprotobuf_proto.Skip(data[index:])
                        if err != nil {
                                return err
                        }
                        if (index + skippy) > l {
                                return io.ErrUnexpectedEOF
                        }
                        m.XXX_unrecognized = append(m.XXX_unrecognized, data[index:index+skippy]...)
                        index += skippy
                }
        }
        return nil
}

        if this == nil {
                return "nil"
        }
        s := strings.Join([]string{`&DictRequest{`,
                `Product:` + valueToStringBfeDictGogo(this.Product) + `,`,
                `ClientIP:` + valueToStringBfeDictGogo(this.ClientIP) + `,`,
                `BaiduID:` + valueToStringBfeDictGogo(this.BaiduID) + `,`,

                `IpCookie:` + valueToStringBfeDictGogo(this.IpCookie) + `,`,
                `XXX_unrecognized:` + fmt1.Sprintf("%v", this.XXX_unrecognized) + `,`,
                `}`,
        }, "")
        return s
}

func valueToStringBfeDictGogo(v interface{}) string {
        rv := reflect.ValueOf(v)
        if rv.IsNil() {
                return "nil"
        }
        pv := reflect.Indirect(rv).Interface()
        return fmt1.Sprintf("*%v", pv)
}
func (m *DictRequest) Size() (n int) {
        var l int
        _ = l
        if m.Product != nil {
                l = len(*m.Product)
                n += 1 + l + sovBfeDictGogo(uint64(l))
        }
        if m.ClientIP != nil {
                l = len(m.ClientIP)
                n += 1 + l + sovBfeDictGogo(uint64(l))
        }
        if m.BaiduID != nil {
                l = len(m.BaiduID)
                n += 1 + l + sovBfeDictGogo(uint64(l))
        }
        if m.Logid != nil {
                n += 1 + sovBfeDictGogo(uint64(*m.Logid))
        }
        if m.Ua != nil {
                l = len(m.Ua)
                n += 1 + l + sovBfeDictGogo(uint64(l))
        }
        if m.IpCookie != nil {
                l = len(m.IpCookie)
                n += 1 + l + sovBfeDictGogo(uint64(l))
        }
        if m.XXX_unrecognized != nil {
                n += len(m.XXX_unrecognized)
        }
        return n
}
func (m *DictResponse) Size() (n int) {
        var l int
        _ = l
        if m.Code != nil {

                l = len(*m.Message)
                n += 1 + l + sovBfeDictGogo(uint64(l))
        }
        if len(m.TagsClientIP) > 0 {
                for _, s := range m.TagsClientIP {
                        l = len(s)
                        n += 1 + l + sovBfeDictGogo(uint64(l))

                        l = len(s)

                }
        }
        if m.XXX_unrecognized != nil {
                n += len(m.XXX_unrecognized)
        }
        return n
}

func sovBfeDictGogo(x uint64) (n int) {
        for {
                n++
                x >>= 7
                if x == 0 {
                        break
                }
        }
        return n
}
func sozBfeDictGogo(x uint64) (n int) {
        return sovBfeDictGogo(uint64((x << 1) ^ uint64((int64(x) >> 63))))
}

type randyBfeDictGogo interface {
        Float32() float32
        Float64() float64
        Int63() int64
        Int31() int32
        Uint32() uint32
        Intn(n int) int
}

func randUTF8RuneBfeDictGogo(r randyBfeDictGogo) rune {
        res := rune(r.Uint32() % 1112064)
        if 55296 <= res {
                res += 2047
        }
        return res
}
func randStringBfeDictGogo(r randyBfeDictGogo) string {
        v13 := r.Intn(100)
        tmps := make([]rune, v13)
        for i := 0; i < v13; i++ {
                tmps[i] = randUTF8RuneBfeDictGogo(r)
        }
        return string(tmps)
}
func randUnrecognizedBfeDictGogo(r randyBfeDictGogo, maxFieldNumber int) (data []byte) {
        l := r.Intn(5)
        for i := 0; i < l; i++ {
                wire := r.Intn(4)
                if wire == 3 {
                        wire = 5
                }
                fieldNumber := maxFieldNumber + r.Intn(100)
                data = randFieldBfeDictGogo(data, r, fieldNumber, wire)
        }
        return data
}
func randFieldBfeDictGogo(data []byte, r randyBfeDictGogo, fieldNumber int, wire int) []byte {
        key := uint32(fieldNumber)<<3 | uint32(wire)
        switch wire {
        case 0:
                data = encodeVarintPopulateBfeDictGogo(data, uint64(key))
                v14 := r.Int63()
                if r.Intn(2) == 0 {
                        v14 *= -1
                }
                data = encodeVarintPopulateBfeDictGogo(data, uint64(v14))
        case 1:
                data = encodeVarintPopulateBfeDictGogo(data, uint64(key))
                data = append(data, byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)))
        case 2:
                data = encodeVarintPopulateBfeDictGogo(data, uint64(key))
                ll := r.Intn(100)
                data = encodeVarintPopulateBfeDictGogo(data, uint64(ll))
                for j := 0; j < ll; j++ {
                        data = append(data, byte(r.Intn(256)))
                }
        default:
                data = encodeVarintPopulateBfeDictGogo(data, uint64(key))
                data = append(data, byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)), byte(r.Intn(256)))
        }
        return data
}
func encodeVarintPopulateBfeDictGogo(data []byte, v uint64) []byte {
        for v >= 1<<7 {
                data = append(data, uint8(uint64(v)&0x7f|0x80))
                v >>= 7
        }
        data = append(data, uint8(v))
        return data
}
func (m *DictRequest) Marshal() (data []byte, err error) {
        size := m.Size()
        data = make([]byte, size)
        n, err := m.MarshalTo(data)
        if err != nil {
                return nil, err
        }
        return data[:n], nil
}

func (m *DictRequest) MarshalTo(data []byte) (n int, err error) {
        var i int
        _ = i
        var l int
        _ = l
        if m.Product != nil {
                data[i] = 0xa
                i++
                i = encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data, i, uint64(len(*m.Product)))
                i += copy(data[i:], *m.Product)
        }
        if m.ClientIP != nil {
                data[i] = 0x12
                i++
                i = encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data, i, uint64(len(m.ClientIP)))
                i += copy(data[i:], m.ClientIP)
        }
        if m.BaiduID != nil {
                data[i] = 0x1a
                i++
                i = encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data, i, uint64(len(m.BaiduID)))
                i += copy(data[i:], m.BaiduID)
        }
        if m.Logid != nil {
                data[i] = 0x28
                i++
                i = encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data, i, uint64(*m.Logid))
        }
        if m.Ua != nil {
                data[i] = 0x32
                i++
                i = encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data, i, uint64(len(m.Ua)))
                i += copy(data[i:], m.Ua)
        }
        if m.IpCookie != nil {
                data[i] = 0x3a
                i++
                i = encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data, i, uint64(len(m.IpCookie)))
                i += copy(data[i:], m.IpCookie)
        }
        if m.XXX_unrecognized != nil {
                i += copy(data[i:], m.XXX_unrecognized)
        }
        return i, nil
}

        if err != nil {

        }

func (m *DictResponse) MarshalTo(data []byte) (n int, err error) {
        var i int
        _ = i
        var l int
        _ = l
        if m.Code != nil {
                data[i] = 0x8
                i++
                i = encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data, i, uint64(*m.Code))
        }
        if m.Message != nil {
                data[i] = 0x12
                i++
                i = encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data, i, uint64(len(*m.Message)))
                i += copy(data[i:], *m.Message)
        }
        if len(m.TagsClientIP) > 0 {
                for _, s := range m.TagsClientIP {
                        data[i] = 0x1a
                        i++
                        l = len(s)
                        for l >= 1<<7 {
                                data[i] = uint8(uint64(l)&0x7f | 0x80)
                                l >>= 7
                                i++
                        }
                        data[i] = uint8(l)
                        i++
                        i += copy(data[i:], s)
                }
        }
        if len(m.TagsBaiduID) > 0 {
                for _, s := range m.TagsBaiduID {
                        data[i] = 0x22
                        i++
                        l = len(s)
                        for l >= 1<<7 {
                                data[i] = uint8(uint64(l)&0x7f | 0x80)
                                l >>= 7
                                i++
                        }
                        data[i] = uint8(l)
                        i++
                        i += copy(data[i:], s)
                }
        }
        if len(m.TagsUa) > 0 {
                for _, s := range m.TagsUa {
                        data[i] = 0x2a
                        i++
                        l = len(s)
                        for l >= 1<<7 {
                                data[i] = uint8(uint64(l)&0x7f | 0x80)
                                l >>= 7
                                i++
                        }
                        data[i] = uint8(l)
                        i++
                        i += copy(data[i:], s)
                }
        }
        if len(m.TagsIpCookie) > 0 {
                for _, s := range m.TagsIpCookie {
                        data[i] = 0x32
                        i++
                        l = len(s)
                        for l >= 1<<7 {
                                data[i] = uint8(uint64(l)&0x7f | 0x80)
                                l >>= 7
                                i++
                        }
                        data[i] = uint8(l)
                        i++
                        i += copy(data[i:], s)
                }
        }
        if m.XXX_unrecognized != nil {
                i += copy(data[i:], m.XXX_unrecognized)
        }
        return i, nil
}
func encodeFixed64BfeDictGogo(data []byte, offset int, v uint64) int {
        data[offset] = uint8(v)
        data[offset+1] = uint8(v >> 8)
        data[offset+2] = uint8(v >> 16)
        data[offset+3] = uint8(v >> 24)
        data[offset+4] = uint8(v >> 32)
        data[offset+5] = uint8(v >> 40)
        data[offset+6] = uint8(v >> 48)
        data[offset+7] = uint8(v >> 56)
        return offset + 8
}
func encodeFixed32BfeDictGogo(data []byte, offset int, v uint32) int {
        data[offset] = uint8(v)
        data[offset+1] = uint8(v >> 8)
        data[offset+2] = uint8(v >> 16)
        data[offset+3] = uint8(v >> 24)
        return offset + 4
}
func encodeVarintBfeDictGogo(data []byte, offset int, v uint64) int {
        for v >= 1<<7 {
                data[offset] = uint8(v&0x7f | 0x80)
                v >>= 7
                offset++
        }
        data[offset] = uint8(v)
        return offset + 1
}
func (this *DictRequest) GoString() string {
        if this == nil {
                return "nil"
        }
        s := strings1.Join([]string{`&dict_pb.DictRequest{` + `Product:` + valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(this.Product, "string"), `ClientIP:` + valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(this.ClientIP, "byte"), `BaiduID:` + valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(this.BaiduID, "byte"), `Logid:` + valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(this.Logid, "uint64"), `Ua:` + valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(this.Ua, "byte"), `IpCookie:` + valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(this.IpCookie, "byte"), `XXX_unrecognized:` + fmt2.Sprintf("%#v", this.XXX_unrecognized) + `}`}, ", ")
        return s
}
func (this *DictResponse) GoString() string {
        if this == nil {
                return "nil"
        }
        s := strings1.Join([]string{`&dict_pb.DictResponse{` + `Code:` + valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(this.Code, "dict_pb.DictResponse_ResponseCode"), `Message:` + valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(this.Message, "string"), `TagsClientIP:` + fmt2.Sprintf("%#v", this.TagsClientIP), `TagsBaiduID:` + fmt2.Sprintf("%#v", this.TagsBaiduID), `TagsUa:` + fmt2.Sprintf("%#v", this.TagsUa), `TagsIpCookie:` + fmt2.Sprintf("%#v", this.TagsIpCookie), `XXX_unrecognized:` + fmt2.Sprintf("%#v", this.XXX_unrecognized) + `}`}, ", ")
        return s
}
func valueToGoStringBfeDictGogo(v interface{}, typ string) string {
        rv := reflect1.ValueOf(v)
        if rv.IsNil() {
                return "nil"
        }
        pv := reflect1.Indirect(rv).Interface()
        return fmt2.Sprintf("func(v %v) *%v { return &v } ( %#v )", typ, typ, pv)
}
func extensionToGoStringBfeDictGogo(e map[int32]code_google_com_p_gogoprotobuf_proto1.Extension) string {
        if e == nil {
                return "nil"
        }
        s := "map[int32]proto.Extension{"
        keys := make([]int, 0, len(e))
        for k := range e {
                keys = append(keys, int(k))
        }
        sort.Ints(keys)
        ss := []string{}
        for _, k := range keys {
                ss = append(ss, strconv.Itoa(k)+": "+e[int32(k)].GoString())
        }
        s += strings1.Join(ss, ",") + "}"
        return s
}
func (this *DictRequest) VerboseEqual(that interface{}) error {
        if that == nil {
                if this == nil {
                        return nil
                }
                return fmt3.Errorf("that == nil && this != nil")
        }

        that1, ok := that.(*DictRequest)
        if !ok {
                return fmt3.Errorf("that is not of type *DictRequest")
        }
        if that1 == nil {
                if this == nil {
                        return nil
                }
                return fmt3.Errorf("that is type *DictRequest but is nil && this != nil")
        } else if this == nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("that is type *DictRequestbut is not nil && this == nil")
        }
        if this.Product != nil && that1.Product != nil {
                if *this.Product != *that1.Product {
                        return fmt3.Errorf("Product this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", *this.Product, *that1.Product)
                }
        } else if this.Product != nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("this.Product == nil && that.Product != nil")
        } else if that1.Product != nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("Product this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.Product, that1.Product)
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.ClientIP, that1.ClientIP) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("ClientIP this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.ClientIP, that1.ClientIP)
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.BaiduID, that1.BaiduID) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("BaiduID this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.BaiduID, that1.BaiduID)
        }
        if this.Logid != nil && that1.Logid != nil {
                if *this.Logid != *that1.Logid {
                        return fmt3.Errorf("Logid this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", *this.Logid, *that1.Logid)
                }
        } else if this.Logid != nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("this.Logid == nil && that.Logid != nil")
        } else if that1.Logid != nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("Logid this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.Logid, that1.Logid)
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.Ua, that1.Ua) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("Ua this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.Ua, that1.Ua)
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.IpCookie, that1.IpCookie) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("IpCookie this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.IpCookie, that1.IpCookie)
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.XXX_unrecognized, that1.XXX_unrecognized) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("XXX_unrecognized this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.XXX_unrecognized, that1.XXX_unrecognized)
        }
        return nil
}
func (this *DictRequest) Equal(that interface{}) bool {
        if that == nil {
                if this == nil {
                        return true
                }
                return false
        }

        that1, ok := that.(*DictRequest)
        if !ok {
                return false
        }
        if that1 == nil {
                if this == nil {
                        return true
                }
                return false
        } else if this == nil {
                return false
        }
        if this.Product != nil && that1.Product != nil {
                if *this.Product != *that1.Product {
                        return false
                }
        } else if this.Product != nil {
                return false
        } else if that1.Product != nil {
                return false
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.ClientIP, that1.ClientIP) {
                return false
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.BaiduID, that1.BaiduID) {
                return false
        }
        if this.Logid != nil && that1.Logid != nil {
                if *this.Logid != *that1.Logid {
                        return false
                }
        } else if this.Logid != nil {
                return false
        } else if that1.Logid != nil {
                return false
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.Ua, that1.Ua) {
                return false
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.IpCookie, that1.IpCookie) {
                return false
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.XXX_unrecognized, that1.XXX_unrecognized) {
                return false
        }
        return true
}
func (this *DictResponse) VerboseEqual(that interface{}) error {
        if that == nil {
                if this == nil {
                        return nil
                }
                return fmt3.Errorf("that == nil && this != nil")
        }

        that1, ok := that.(*DictResponse)
        if !ok {
                return fmt3.Errorf("that is not of type *DictResponse")
        }
        if that1 == nil {
                if this == nil {
                        return nil
                }
                return fmt3.Errorf("that is type *DictResponse but is nil && this != nil")
        } else if this == nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("that is type *DictResponsebut is not nil && this == nil")
        }
        if this.Code != nil && that1.Code != nil {
                if *this.Code != *that1.Code {
                        return fmt3.Errorf("Code this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", *this.Code, *that1.Code)
                }
        } else if this.Code != nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("this.Code == nil && that.Code != nil")
        } else if that1.Code != nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("Code this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.Code, that1.Code)
        }
        if this.Message != nil && that1.Message != nil {
                if *this.Message != *that1.Message {
                        return fmt3.Errorf("Message this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", *this.Message, *that1.Message)
                }
        } else if this.Message != nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("this.Message == nil && that.Message != nil")
        } else if that1.Message != nil {
                return fmt3.Errorf("Message this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.Message, that1.Message)
        }
        if len(this.TagsClientIP) != len(that1.TagsClientIP) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("TagsClientIP this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", len(this.TagsClientIP), len(that1.TagsClientIP))
        }
        for i := range this.TagsClientIP {
                if this.TagsClientIP[i] != that1.TagsClientIP[i] {
                        return fmt3.Errorf("TagsClientIP this[%v](%v) Not Equal that[%v](%v)", i, this.TagsClientIP[i], i, that1.TagsClientIP[i])
                }
        }
        if len(this.TagsBaiduID) != len(that1.TagsBaiduID) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("TagsBaiduID this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", len(this.TagsBaiduID), len(that1.TagsBaiduID))
        }
        for i := range this.TagsBaiduID {
                if this.TagsBaiduID[i] != that1.TagsBaiduID[i] {
                        return fmt3.Errorf("TagsBaiduID this[%v](%v) Not Equal that[%v](%v)", i, this.TagsBaiduID[i], i, that1.TagsBaiduID[i])
                }
        }
        if len(this.TagsUa) != len(that1.TagsUa) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("TagsUa this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", len(this.TagsUa), len(that1.TagsUa))
        }
        for i := range this.TagsUa {
                if this.TagsUa[i] != that1.TagsUa[i] {
                        return fmt3.Errorf("TagsUa this[%v](%v) Not Equal that[%v](%v)", i, this.TagsUa[i], i, that1.TagsUa[i])
                }
        }
        if len(this.TagsIpCookie) != len(that1.TagsIpCookie) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("TagsIpCookie this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", len(this.TagsIpCookie), len(that1.TagsIpCookie))
        }
        for i := range this.TagsIpCookie {
                if this.TagsIpCookie[i] != that1.TagsIpCookie[i] {
                        return fmt3.Errorf("TagsIpCookie this[%v](%v) Not Equal that[%v](%v)", i, this.TagsIpCookie[i], i, that1.TagsIpCookie[i])
                }
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.XXX_unrecognized, that1.XXX_unrecognized) {
                return fmt3.Errorf("XXX_unrecognized this(%v) Not Equal that(%v)", this.XXX_unrecognized, that1.XXX_unrecognized)
        }
        return nil
}
func (this *DictResponse) Equal(that interface{}) bool {
        if that == nil {
                if this == nil {
                        return true
                }
                return false
        }

        that1, ok := that.(*DictResponse)
        if !ok {
                return false
        }
        if that1 == nil {
                if this == nil {
                        return true
                }
                return false
        } else if this == nil {
                return false
        }
        if this.Code != nil && that1.Code != nil {
                if *this.Code != *that1.Code {
                        return false
                }
        } else if this.Code != nil {
                return false
        } else if that1.Code != nil {
                return false
        }
        if this.Message != nil && that1.Message != nil {
                if *this.Message != *that1.Message {
                        return false
                }
        } else if this.Message != nil {
                return false
        } else if that1.Message != nil {
                return false
        }
        if len(this.TagsClientIP) != len(that1.TagsClientIP) {
                return false
        }
        for i := range this.TagsClientIP {
                if this.TagsClientIP[i] != that1.TagsClientIP[i] {
                        return false
                }
        }
        if len(this.TagsBaiduID) != len(that1.TagsBaiduID) {
                return false
        }
        for i := range this.TagsBaiduID {
                if this.TagsBaiduID[i] != that1.TagsBaiduID[i] {
                        return false
                }
        }
        if len(this.TagsUa) != len(that1.TagsUa) {
                return false
        }
        for i := range this.TagsUa {
                if this.TagsUa[i] != that1.TagsUa[i] {
                        return false
                }
        }
        if len(this.TagsIpCookie) != len(that1.TagsIpCookie) {
                return false
        }
        for i := range this.TagsIpCookie {
                if this.TagsIpCookie[i] != that1.TagsIpCookie[i] {
                        return false
                }
        }
        if !bytes.Equal(this.XXX_unrecognized, that1.XXX_unrecognized) {
                return false
        }
        return true
}

/* dict_rule_load.go - load config of product rules from configuration file */
/*
modification history
--------------------
2015/10/20, by geng chao, create
*/
/*
DESCRIPTION
*/

package mod_dict_client

import (
    "encoding/json"
    "errors"
    "fmt"
    "os"
)

import (

    "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/log"
)

import (
    "bfe_basic/condition"
)

/*
* parse rules.data configuration file
* conf format:
* {
*     "Config": {
*        "wise": [
*             "cond": "xxx"
*          ],
*          "xxx":[]
*      },
*      "Version": "1234"
* }
 */

/* load config of rules from file

   Returns:
        (RuleConf, error)
*/

type RuleFile struct {
    Cond     *string
}
type RuleFileList []RuleFile
type DictRulesFile map[string]*RuleFileList // product name => list of product rules List
type DictRuleConfFile struct {
    Version *string
    Config  *DictRulesFile
}

type Rule struct {
    Cond      condition.Condition // condition for dict-client filter
}
type RuleList []Rule
type ProductRules map[string]*RuleList
type DictRuleConf struct {
    Version string       // version of the config
    Config  ProductRules // product rules
}

func ruleConvert(ruleFile RuleFile) (*Rule, error) {
    rule := new(Rule)
    cond, err := condition.Build(*ruleFile.Cond)
    if err != nil {
        return rule, err
    }
    rule.Cond = cond
    return rule, nil
}

func ruleListConvert(ruleFileList *RuleFileList) (*RuleList, error) {
    ruleList := new(RuleList)
    *ruleList = make([]Rule, 0)

    if(ruleFileList == nil) {
        return ruleList, nil
    }
    for _, ruleFile := range *ruleFileList {
        rule, err := ruleConvert(ruleFile)
        if err != nil {
            return nil, err
        }

        *ruleList = append(*ruleList, *rule) 
    }
    return ruleList, nil
}

// check Rule
func ruleCheck(conf RuleFile) error {
    // check Cond
    if conf.Cond == nil {
        return errors.New("error: not write Condition")
    }
    return nil
}

// check RuleList
func ruleListCheck(conf *RuleFileList) error {
    for index, rule := range *conf {
        err := ruleCheck(rule)
        if err != nil {
            return fmt.Errorf("RuleListCheck:%d, %s", index, err.Error())
        }
    }
    return nil
}

// check Rules
func rulesFileCheck(conf *DictRulesFile) error {
    for product, ruleList := range *conf {
        if ruleList == nil || len(*ruleList) == 0 {
            if openDebug {
                log.Logger.Debug("rulesFileCheck(): ruleList is empty")
            }
            continue
        }
        err := ruleListCheck(ruleList)
        if err != nil {
            return fmt.Errorf("ProductRules:%s, %s", product, err.Error())
        }
    }
    return nil
}

// validate config Files
func ruleConfCheck(conf *DictRuleConfFile) error {
    var err error

    // check Version
    if conf.Version == nil {
        return errors.New("no Version")
    }
    // check Config
    if conf.Config == nil {
        return errors.New("no Config")
    }
    err = rulesFileCheck(conf.Config)
    if err != nil {
        return fmt.Errorf("Config:%s", err.Error())
    }

    return nil
}

func RulesConfLoad(filename string) (DictRuleConf, error) {
    var dictCfg DictRuleConf

    ruleList := new(RuleList)
    /* open the file    */
    file, err := os.Open(filename)
    if err != nil {
        return dictCfg, err
    }
    defer file.Close()
    /* decode the file  */
    decoder := json.NewDecoder(file)
    var config DictRuleConfFile
    if err = decoder.Decode(&config); err != nil {
        return dictCfg, err
    }

    // check Rules config
    if err = ruleConfCheck(&config); err != nil {
        return dictCfg, err
    }

    // convert config
    dictCfg.Version = *config.Version
    dictCfg.Config = make(ProductRules)

    for product, rulesFileList := range *config.Config {
        ruleList, err = ruleListConvert(rulesFileList)
        if err != nil {
            return dictCfg, err
        }
        dictCfg.Config[product] = ruleList
    }

    return dictCfg, nil
}
/* mod_dict_client.go - module for adding tags to request */
/*
modification history
--------------------
2014/8/11, by Sijie YANG, create
*/
/*
DESCRIPTION
*/
package mod_dict_client

import (
    "crypto/md5"
    "encoding/json"
    "fmt"
    "net/url"
    "strings"
    "time"
)

import (
    "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/delay_counter"
    "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/log"
    "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/module_state2"
    "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/remote"
    "www.baidu.com/golang-lib/web_monitor"
)

import (
    "bfe_basic"
    "bfe_http"
    "bfe_module"
    "bfe_modules/mod_dict_client/dict_pb"
)

// setting for DelayCounter
const (
    DELAY_COUNTER_INTERVAL      = 60    // interval for moving current to past (in s)
    DELAY_COUNTER_BUCKET_SIZE   = 1     // size of delay counter bucket (in ms)
    DELAY_COUNTER_BUCKET_NUM    = 10    // number of delay counter bucket
)

// const for headers values
const HEADER_USER_AGENT = "User-Agent"

var (
    openDebug = false
)

// key for counter of mod_dict_client
var COUNTER_KEYS = []string {
    "REQ_TOTAL",            // total requests send to dict server
    "REQ_CALL_ERR",         // requests call error (send fail, timeout, etc)
    "CALL_RESPONSE_OK",     // requests proc success by dict server
    "CALL_RESPONSE_ERR",    // requests proc failure by dict server
}

type ModuleDictClient struct {
    name      string                     // name of module
    state     *module_state2.State       // module state
    delay     *delay_counter.DelayRecent // for monitor internel delay

    conf      *ConfModDictClient         // dict config
    client    remote.IClient             // dict client
    ruleTable *ProductRuleTable          // table for product rules
}

func NewModuleDictClient() *ModuleDictClient {
    m := new(ModuleDictClient)
    m.name = "mod_dict_client"

    m.state = new(module_state2.State)
    m.state.Init()
    m.state.CountersInit(COUNTER_KEYS)
    m.state.SetNoahKeyPrefix(bfe_basic.NOAH_SD_MOD_DIC_CLIENT)

    m.delay = new(delay_counter.DelayRecent)
    m.delay.Init(DELAY_COUNTER_INTERVAL, DELAY_COUNTER_BUCKET_SIZE, DELAY_COUNTER_BUCKET_NUM)
    m.delay.SetNoahKeyPrefix(bfe_basic.NOAH_MOD_DICT_DELAY)

    m.ruleTable = NewProductRuleTable()
    return m
}

func (m *ModuleDictClient) Name() string {
    return m.name
}

func (m *ModuleDictClient) Attr() map[string]interface{} {
    // monitor items (item name, item type)
    monitorEntries := map[string]string {
        m.name           : bfe_basic.MON_TYPE_STATE,
        m.name + ".delay": bfe_basic.MON_TYPE_DELAY_RECENT,
    }
    // reload items
    reloadEntries := []string{
        m.name + ".product_rule_table",
    }
    return map[string]interface{} {
        bfe_basic.MON_ATTR_MONITOR: monitorEntries,
        bfe_basic.MON_ATTR_RELOAD:  reloadEntries,
    }
}

// init dict client
func (m *ModuleDictClient) initDictClient() error {
    cfg := m.conf.DictClient
    m.client = remote.NewClient(cfg.Network, cfg.Address,
                                    time.Duration(cfg.ConnectTimeout) * time.Millisecond,
                                    cfg.Concurrency, nil, cfg.PendingNum)
    return nil
}

// loadRulesConf is a registered reload callback
// params:
//   - query: url query, query["path"] is the file need to load
//          if query["path"] is not set, use default path
func (m *ModuleDictClient) loadRulesConf(query url.Values) error {
    // get reload file path
    path := query.Get("path")
    if path == "" {
        // use default
        path = m.conf.CondRules.Path
    }

    dictConf, err := RulesConfLoad(path)
    if err != nil {
        return fmt.Errorf("err in loadRulesConf(%s):%s", path, err)
    }

    m.ruleTable.Update(dictConf)
    
    return nil
}

func getUaMd5Value(request *bfe_basic.Request) []byte {
    httpReq := request.HttpRequest

    // get user agent
    userAgent := httpReq.Header.Get(HEADER_USER_AGENT)
    if len(userAgent) != 0 {
        // parse ua
        uaMd5 := fmt.Sprintf("%x", md5.Sum([]byte(userAgent)))
        uaValue := []byte(uaMd5)
        return uaValue
    } else {
        if openDebug {
            log.Logger.Debug("getUaMd5Value: Not get Request User Agent")
        }
        return nil
    }
}

func getIpCookieMd5Value(request *bfe_basic.Request) []byte {
    var baiduId string

    // get client ip
    clientIp := request.RemoteAddr.IP.String()

    if request.Baiduid == "" {
        baiduId = "-"
    } else {
        baiduId = request.Baiduid
    }

    Key := strings.Join([]string{clientIp, baiduId}, ":")
    if len(Key) != 0 {

        IpCookieMd5 := fmt.Sprintf("%x", md5.Sum([]byte(Key)))
        IpCookieValue := []byte(IpCookieMd5)
        return IpCookieValue
    } else {
        if openDebug {
            log.Logger.Debug("getIpCookieMd5Value: Not get Request ClienIp:Baiduid")
        }
        return nil
    }
}

// prepare dict request
func (m *ModuleDictClient) prepareDictRequest(request *bfe_basic.Request) (
                                              *dict_pb.DictRequest) {
    req := new(dict_pb.DictRequest)

    // product 
    req.Product = &request.Route.Product

    // client ip
    req.ClientIP = request.RemoteAddr.IP.To4()
    
    //baiduID
    req.BaiduID = request.BaiduidHex
    if req.BaiduID == nil {
        req.BaiduID = make([]byte, 0)   // not check baiduid
    }

    //ua
    req.Ua = getUaMd5Value(request)
    if req.Ua == nil {
        req.Ua = make([]byte, 0)   // not check ua
    }

    //ip cookie
    req.IpCookie = getIpCookieMd5Value(request)
    if req.IpCookie == nil {
        req.IpCookie = make([]byte, 0)   // not check ua
    }
    return req
}

// process dict response
func (m *ModuleDictClient) processDictResponse(request *bfe_basic.Request,
                                               dictResp *dict_pb.DictResponse) {
    // add tags to orginal request
    if (*dictResp.Code == dict_pb.DictResponse_OK) {
        request.Tags.IPTags = dictResp.TagsClientIP
        request.Tags.BaiduIDTags = dictResp.TagsBaiduID
        request.Tags.UserAgentTags = dictResp.TagsUa
        request.Tags.IPCookieTags = dictResp.TagsIpCookie
        
        if openDebug {
            log.Logger.Debug("%s: add tags to request(ip: %v, baidid: %v, UA: %v, IPCookie: %v)",
                             m.name, request.Tags.IPTags, request.Tags.BaiduIDTags, request.Tags.UserAgentTags, request.Tags.IPCookieTags)
        }
        m.state.Inc("CALL_RESPONSE_OK", 1)
    } else {
        err := fmt.Errorf("%s:request error: %d %s", m.name, *dictResp.Code, dictResp.Code.String())
        request.Tags.Error = err
        if openDebug {
            log.Logger.Debug("%s: %s", m.name, err.Error())
        }
        m.state.Inc("CALL_RESPONSE_ERR", 1)
    }
}

func (m *ModuleDictClient) dictProcess(request *bfe_basic.Request) {
    // create dict request
    dictReq := m.prepareDictRequest(request)
    m.state.Inc("REQ_TOTAL", 1)

    // request dict server
    dictResp := new(dict_pb.DictResponse)
    duration := time.Duration(m.conf.DictClient.ConnectTimeout) * time.Millisecond
    err := m.client.Call(dictReq, dictResp, duration)
    // process dict response
    if err == nil {
        m.processDictResponse(request, dictResp)
    } else {
        if openDebug {
            log.Logger.Debug("%s: request dict server error: %s", m.name, err.Error())
        }
        m.state.Inc("REQ_CALL_ERR", 1)
    }
}

// dict handler
func (m *ModuleDictClient) dictHandler(request *bfe_basic.Request) (int, *bfe_http.Response) {
    if openDebug {
        log.Logger.Debug("%s: process request (ip=%s, baiduid=%s)", 
                         m.name, request.RemoteAddr.IP, request.Baiduid)
    }
    procStart := time.Now()

    // find rules for given product info
    rules := m.ruleTable.Search(request.Route.Product)
